_comment: OMN-200: Pyright Migration Timeline - See _phase_* fields for details
_phase_1_current: Q4 2024 - CURRENT: Baseline establishment with basic mode. All strict rules disabled to establish baseline without CI failures.
_phase_2_q1_2025: Q1 2025: Enable reportReturnType, reportArgumentType, reportAssignmentType. Target: Fix ~500 type errors.
_phase_3_q2_2025: Q2 2025: Enable reportGeneralTypeIssues, reportCallIssue, reportIndexIssue, reportOperatorIssue. Target: Fix ~1000 type errors.
_phase_4_q3_2025: Q3 2025: Move to 'standard' typeCheckingMode. Enable remaining strict rules. Target: Full pyright compliance.
_section_phase_1_baseline: === PHASE 1 BASELINE (Current) - Rules kept at warning or false ===
_phase_2_note: These rules catch return type mismatches, argument type errors, and assignment issues. ~500 errors expected.
_phase_3_note: These rules catch general type issues, call signature problems, and index access errors. ~1000 errors expected.
_phase_4_note: These rules eliminate 'Unknown' types from the codebase. Requires explicit type annotations everywhere.
_low_priority_note: These rules are lower priority and may remain disabled. Enable based on team needs.
